stories.title: Tools to Measure Software Energy Consumption from Your Computer

How College Teaching Can Have a Future

stories.text:
After 9 long months of coding, testing, and refining we're excited to release our daily Python newsletter, built with Python!

We scan millions of posts a day from Twitter, Reddit, Hacker News, and other social sites to bring you the best Python articles that people are discussing, ranked by our unique score that uses signals like upvotes, comments, and poster authority.

Finally, we summarize each article and wrap it all up in a nice daily email. It sounds easy, but it's been quite the journey...

While we are only just launching today we have been building "back issues" for the past 4 months to help us quality control the content.

You can have a look at what would have been sent out over the past 4 months here:

https://morningbrief.ai/python/daily/issues (click any issue link to see inside the issue)

If you like what you see we'd love for you to join the real mailing list (forever free) and help us test it out:

https://morningbrief.ai/python

We'll be rolling out more high-quality newsletters in the coming weeks, based on the 150k+ semantic tags that our system already knows about. If you have a favorite topic that you'd like to see, let us know and we'll prioritize it for you :)

Thanks so much for reading!
